scripts.dev: concurrently -n gateway,auth,menu,orders,inventory,group,notify -c green,blue,magenta,cyan,yellow,white,gray "npm --prefix gateway run dev" "npm --prefix services/auth run dev" "npm --prefix services/menu run dev" "npm --prefix services/orders run dev" "npm --prefix services/inventory run dev" "npm --prefix services/group-orders run dev" "npm --prefix services/notifications run dev"
